description:
::: The "Celebrate HP webOS" Sale! :::
"Everybody's fan favorite...a 100% Steal!" (webOSRoundup Podcast #4, 6/25/2010)
::: A Palm Hot Apps Winner 2010 ::: 

More features. More control. More intuitive. No ads.  This is Radio Hibiki, an official partner with SHOUTcast Radio and the most powerful streaming Internet radio application for your HP/Palm webOS device with over 45,000 stations and more advanced features to leave you in total control of your listening experience. 

Don't believe us? Compare these features to your current player: 

* FULL dashboard/notifications 
* Full integration with SHOUTcast™, Icecast, and MP3/AAC streams
* Artist and Song Title (where available) 
* Advanced, stylish player 
* In-Player Random Stations and Random Favorites
* Maximize battery life with the Bitrate Filter and Sleep Timer
* View and Add Favorite and Custom Stations
* Keep track of your Recently Played stations
* View an organized list of dozens of Genres and Subgenres
* Shake to select a random favorite
* Full Preferences Panel
* And, of course, Radio Hibiki contains NO ads!

Be sure to follow us on Facebook or on Twitter at @radiohibiki for the latest news.

::: About SHOUTcast™ Radio: SHOUTcast™ Radio is one of the largest directories of professionally and community programmed online radio stations in the world. Today, SHOUTcast™ Radio features over 45,000 stations from around the globe. If you’re into popular or indie music, or want to check out local or world programming, you’re sure to find something you like on SHOUTcast™ Radio.
